rows.label: qst202701_msg0001
rows.name:
Me-Mo-mo? Friend looking fidgety.
Something wrong?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0002
rows.name: Maybe look for someone?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0003
rows.name: Yes, indeed.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0004
rows.name:
Daughterpon of Mamumu recently get
into habit of leaving house late at night.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0005
rows.name:
Mamumu find this worrying, so
me look for her in all sort of places.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0006
rows.name:
I think any parent would get worried
if their daughter was skulking about...

rows.label: qst202701_msg0007
rows.name:
Spoken like a true master of skulking,
My Prince!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0008
rows.name: Gwahahahaha!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0009
rows.name: W-what so funny, Mo-mo?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0010
rows.name:
What you're doing, my friend,
is called mollycoddling.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0011
rows.name:
Mamumu not coddle anything!
Just do what any parent do!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0012
rows.name:
Hah. In my younger days, the night
was always my playground...

rows.label: qst202701_msg0013
rows.name:
You say younger days, but didn't you
literally get awoken, like, yesterday?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0014
rows.name: Yeah, aren't you basically a newborn?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0015
rows.name:
Oh, Pandy, Zeke, you don't get it!
These memories don't rest in my head...

rows.label: qst202701_msg0016
rows.name: They are carved into my very core.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0017
rows.name: ...Right. Yeah. Okay.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0018
rows.name:
Even as a Nopon, did you never
in your younger days yield yourself
to the night and run wild?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0019
rows.name:
Mo-mo, admittedly me did go out a lot
when younger, get into more than a
few scrapes...

rows.label: qst202701_msg0020
rows.name:
Then why not allow your daughter her
proclivities? If you try to bind her, she
may rebel even more... Not unlike me.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0021
rows.name: No, this situation completely different!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0022
rows.name: What's different?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0023
rows.name:
Me manage to discover every night,
when daughterpon go out, she go take
part in some weird gathering...

rows.label: qst202701_msg0024
rows.name: A 'gathering'? Oho, better and better!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0025
rows.name: Better-schmetter!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0026
rows.name:
Weird apocalypse cult called
Harbingers of Eschapon now popular
and daughterpon may be one of them!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0027
rows.name:
Apocalypse cult called...
Harbingers of Eschapon, huh...?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0028
rows.name: You know 'em, Mei?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0029
rows.name:
Nah, but I have to say the name is
rockin'!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0030
rows.name: Tora think so too! Very cool sound!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0031
rows.name:
Hana unclear on derivation, but
have to agree it sound edgy and cool.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0032
rows.name:
Right? Right?!
You guys get me!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0033
rows.name: This is too much even for me...

rows.label: qst202701_msg0034
rows.name:
Um, can we go back to where there's
an apocalypse cult out there...?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0035
rows.name:
The chum's got a point.
We should check it out!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0036
rows.name:
You would?!
Thank you!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0037
rows.name:
First of all, let's find out what this
whole cult thing is about.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0038
rows.name:
Let's talk to people and
gather some intel!
